name: Get2gether @ Little Big Chicken Fry
description:
Fancy a meal? 

Get together with your new flame at the worst restaurant in the bi-state area!

Meet up with fun-loving single gal Frilina for fun, food and frustration. Choose your dishes wisely if you want to win her heart. Any wrong moves and you'll be tossed out like last nights shrimp salad.

Is it "happily ever after" or are there plenty more fish in the sea? Don't let this big trout slip away.

Bonapple teeth!

Made with love by Tom & Amy.

(DISCLAIMER: Tom was an event organiser for Kiwijam though any advantages this may have provided in terms of theme knowledge were offset by our incompetence).
